thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Samantha Hughes
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Samantha Hughes

author: Samantha Hughes
title: Samantha Hughes
text:
I ordered the 220g chocolate brown set and I'm in love with the quality and how comfortable they feel when I wear them and they look so beautiful and natural! The color blended perfectly with my natural hair color and I've been wearing them every day since they arrived in the mail. I will definitely buy all my sets in the future from Luxy Hair and I promise they now have a loyal customer in me. Thank you also for providing me with amazing customer support. I corresponded with Patricia from Luxy Hair and she was so kind and very helpful! I absolutely love their hair extensions and I'm very happy with my order and the customer service I received!
Thanks again guys!
Lots of love and wishes,
Sam
